name: Pictomage
description:
You are Magus Maximillius - a Pictomancer. Use your magical camera to capture and defeat the ancient defense systems guarding your rival's tower.

Fight through over 20 action packed levels. Each level has it's own little twist. Try to beat my best time! (2:45)

The game also comes with a built in level editor - the same one that was used to make all the levels.
